function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High reliance on online teaching during COVID-19","Impact":"Decreased utilization of offline education facilities","Mitigation":"Invest in hybrid teaching methods and infrastructure to ensure a balance between online and offline education","Technologies":"Video conferencing, educational software, online learning platforms","People":"Students, educators, families","Owner":"Education institutions, government"},{"Description":"Worries about the quality of online teaching","Impact":"Reduced satisfaction and effectiveness of online education","Mitigation":"Provide training and support for educators to enhance online teaching quality","Technologies":"Online training modules, educational resources","People":"Educators, students, families","Owner":"Schools, education departments"},{"Description":"Unprotected working hours of parents due to online teaching","Impact":"Increased stress and work-life imbalance for parents","Mitigation":"Flexible work arrangements, access to childcare services, and parental support programs","Technologies":"Remote work tools, childcare booking platforms","People":"Working parents, families","Owner":"Employers, government"}]}
